name: Rechel's Ring of Larceny
flavorText: Rechel, a prominent member of Kingsport's Thieves Guild, may not have been the stealthiest cutpurse, but thanks in part to this ring, she was never caught by the authorities.
flavorTextHtml: Rechel, a prominent member of Kingsport's Thieves Guild, may not have been the stealthiest cutpurse, but thanks in part to this ring, she was never caught by the authorities.

secondary.textHtml: [1.0 - 5.1]% Chance to Fear on Hit
Gain 57% increased movement speed for 4 seconds after Fearing an enemy. [45 - 60]%
